name: Webplugs
description: Missing standards from the browser, usable as polyfills or importable libs.

name: Web Candies
description: Development sugar syntax to make development easier, easily convertible to/from plain JS.

name: Web Blocks
description: Series of standard, inter-operable blocks (behaviors, elements, etc.).

name: Web Behaviors
description: Standard to allow custom attributes to add functionality to any HTML element.

name: Web Injectors
description: Dependency injection system for the web. Supports scopes, provide/consume syntax.
details: The Web Injectors project aims to bring standard dependency injection to the web platform, solving the problem of loading dependencies without build tools or import maps limitations. It introduces 'scope', 'provide', and 'consume' syntax to managing isolated contexts and explicit data flow.

name: Web Registries
description: Allow creation of custom registries, similar to customElementsRegistry, for many purposes.

name: Web Contexts
description: Similar to React context but for the standard web platform.
